short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use <Ctrl-N> to traverse input suggestions intead of arrow keys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Everyone likes shortcuts.

Everyone is tired of using <Up> and <Down> arrow keys when choosing suggestions provided by search input box.

It's time to change now.

If you're using Mac OS X, you can use <Ctrl-N> and <Ctrl-P> to traverse the suggestion list.
